news_header: Trump sued Twitter after his account was frozen following the Capitol riots in 2021. The company, now known as X, has agreed to pay him approximately $10 million in compensation.
news_original_title: Elon Muskin X maksaa korvaukset Trumpille – osapuolet sopuun Trumpin nostamassa oikeusjutussa
news_text: Trump claimed that his freedom of expression was violated when his account was frozen due to concerns it could incite violence. His account was reinstated in November 2022 after Elon Musk purchased Twitter and renamed it X. Additionally, Meta announced it would pay $25 million to settle a related lawsuit with Trump.
